TFE: hire slowly and never in desperation. that urgent hire you must have *right now* often turns out to feel unnecessary in 3 months.

TFE: build your metrics dashboard *before* you launch. If you don't it a) takes months to do and b) has you flying blind in a crucial time.
TFE: focus on Operational Tempo. How fast are your release cycles? Product decisions? It's a virtuous cycle. Speed leads 2 more speed.
